name: Tetris++

screenshots.caption: Screenshot from the first release of Tetris++

short_description: Tetris++ is yet another cross-plattform clone of the good old Tetris. Tetris++ will first be a clone of the original with a bit more fancy graphics and will be enriched with new features in the future.
